LanguageData.DesignatorCollectSandDesc: Designate areas of sand to collect.
LanguageData.NoMoreThanOne: You may only build one of this type of building
LanguageData.MaximumAssemblyLines: You have built the maximum number of assembly lines
LanguageData.NoRecipesFound: No recipes found :(\nWhat have you done?
LanguageData.AssemblyLineConstructionFinished: {0} has finished construction and is now ready for use!
LanguageData.DeleteAssemblyLine:
WARNING

This will permanently delete this assembly line!

Are you sure you wish to continue?
LanguageData.DeleteAssemblyLineUnderConstruction:
WARNING

This will permanently delete this assembly line! You will be refunded most of the materials it has acquired for construction.

 Are you sure you wish to continue?
LanguageData.OnFissureReportString: Must be placed on a fissure
LanguageData.OnMudOrWaterReportString: Must be placed on mud or shallow water
LanguageData.MaximumFiveReportString: You may only build a maximum of five of this building
LanguageData.MaximumOneReportString: Only one of this building may be built at any one time
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectClayDesc: Designate areas of mud or shallow water to collect clay
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectClayReportString: Must designate mud or shallow water terrain
LanguageData.DroidSelfDestructPrompt: Are you sure you want to command this droid to self-destruct? This will destroy the droid and possibly cause an explosion.
LanguageData.Alert_DroidPowerCriticallyLowDescription: A droid's power levels have dropped dangerously low! If it is not already, get it headed to a charge pad immediately!
LanguageData.Alert_DroidPowerLowDescription: A droid's power levels are getting low. Make sure it does not stray too far from a charge pad.
